skills.name: Soothing Chant
skills.raw_description:
Heals a target ally by 35% HP. This Heal can be critical.
Lvl. 2 Heal +5%
Lvl. 3 Heal +5%
Lvl. 4 Heal +5%

skills.name: Boon of Speed
skills.raw_description:
Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Fills the Turn Meter of all allies by 15%.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
